titleStmt.title: Meditations vppon the mysteries of our holy faith with the practise of mental praier touching the same composed in Spanish by the R.F. Luys de la Puente ... ; and translated into English by F. Rich. Gibbons ...
titleStmt.author: Puente, Luis de la, 1554-1624.
Gibbons, Richard, 1550?-1632.

notesStmt.note: In two parts. Each part has separate t.p. and separate pagination; no collective t.p.
Signatures: [pi] Ap4s A-Z8 Aa2 a2 A-T8 V5.
Signatures G4 and 3P4 misprinted as F4 and 3P respectively.
Numbers 95 and 96 not used in first pagination sequence.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
